Enter About Us The Grape & Grain Wine & Brewery Warehouse is the new name for John Arkell Vintners, who have been supplying Swindon & the local area with premium wines, beers and spirits since 1962. Our new premises and heritage centre was opened to coincide with theÂ 175thÂ anniversary of John Arkell foundingÂ Arkell's Brewery in 1843. A very proudÂ day it was on 30 January 2018 when weÂ were delightedÂ toÂ welcome HRH The Duchess of Cornwall to celebrate the occasionÂ and for her Highness to take a tour of the warehouseÂ before officially unveiling a plaque in honour of her visit. Today, the Grape & GrainÂ Wine & Brewery WarehouseÂ is run byÂ our Directors, Nicholas Arkell and Richard Bailey. Assisted by Rowan Doyle, Lisa Aldridge, Karen Conn, Lesley Dicks and Paul Buckingham. We are open 9-5pm from Monday to Friday to members of the public & the trade, who can not only browse & purchase from our premium selection of wines, beers & spirits but alsoÂ feel free to exploreÂ our heritage centre upstairs. Yoshinogawa Sake Dinner Brand of the Month: Tomatin Distillery About us At Grape'n Grain , we take pride in the quality of our products and the relationships we build with our clients. Our team of passionate wine enthusiasts has decades of combined experience, and we are dedicated to helping you find the perfect wine or spirit. We understand the importance of authenticity and origin, which is why we source directly from producers and store our products in temperature-controlled warehouses. Established in 1986, Fine Vintage Ltd. is a well-known importer of Fine Wine and Spirits in Hong Kong, and Grape n Grain was created to cater to the needs of private individuals searching for the best wines and spirits from both the old and new world. As an independent, privately owned company majority owned by Richard Paine and his wife Hiromi, the Fine Vintage team is made up of knowledgeable and passionate wine enthusiasts with decades of combined experience. We are unique in that we are one of the only wine & spirits distributors in Hong Kong to own our office, warehousing & bonded warehouse. We have strong experience in selecting, importing and distributing some of the finest wines and spirits of Europe and the â€œNew Worldâ€, representing mainly family-owned top producers who are well recognized and respected within the industry. We have developed close relationships with our producers and many of them have been represented by Fine Vintage for over 30 years. We have developed strong relationships with our clients with whom we have created decades of loyal partnerships. Our clients include leaders in the restaurant trade, hotels, private members clubs, specialist retail stores and direct to private customers in Hong Kong and Macau. About Us - The Grain and Grape Facebook Instagram YouTube Search The Grain and Grape Travel Photos, Stories, and Recommendations Travel Africa England, Scotland, Ireland Eastern Europe Northern Europe Southern Europe Western Europe Travel Tips Travel Itineraries Travel Planning Travel Tips by Destination Travel Books Foods of the World Living Abroad International Sports World Treasures About Us Contact About Us Hi everyone, Rob and Barbara here. A little about us: Two of our favorite things in life are traveling and spending time with friends, family, and meeting new people who become friends. We moved to Germany in August of 2021, and living abroad has certainly been an adventure. We started our website to share our stories with family and friends back home, and to have a travel diary with photos of our trips. Besides our collection of travel stories and tips , we have a page for foods of the world , which includes our culinary adventures and recipes we collect from around Europe. We also share some of our favorite books , both fiction and non-fiction, mostly around travel or food themes. Lastly, our page for living abroad includes local trips, international sporting events, and festivals around Germany. We love the feeling of home and fellowship that Irish Pubs all over the world offer. With this in mind, we try to style our stories to match the friendliness of the Irish, telling them as if we are sharing them with friends down at the pub . We hope that our site is either helpful, entertaining, or both. Cheers! We are so grateful for this opportunity to travel around Europe. Even the challenges of living in another country are an opportunity for growth. Sometimes we feel like we are semi-retired, because of the slower pace of life here. Often we dream of when we end this assignment and head back to the US. Buying a home after being an expat should be especially interesting. Weâ€™ll buy the first one that has air conditioning! Or a garbage disposal. For now, weâ€™ll remember to appreciate where we are and what we have. Meanwhile, we may look at living in another country. Italy always seems appealing! But enough about us. ğŸ˜Š Search by TOPIC International Sports Mini Adventures Albania Austria Belgium Croatia Czech Republic Denmark Egypt England Estonia Finland France Germany Greece Hungary Iceland Ireland Italy Latvia Liechtenstein Lithuania Luxembourg Malta Norway Poland Portugal Romania Scotland Slovakia Slovenia Spain Sweden Switzerland Tunisia Turkey The Grain and Grape provides travel photos, stories, and recommendations from around the world. Subscribe to our newsletters. Weâ€™ll keep you in the loop. Use tab to navigate through the menu items. ğŸ‰ Host Your Next Event at Grape and The Grain - Your Perfect Venue for Every Occasion! ğŸ¥‚ğŸˆ Grape & The Grain Jan 30, 2024 2 min read Are you in search of the ideal venue to host your upcoming event, be it a lively party, a professional corporate gathering, a milestone birthday celebration, a dreamy wedding, or any other special occasion on your list? Look no further because Grape and The Grain has everything you need to make your event unforgettable! Our Unique Event Spaces: At Grape and The Grain, we offer a variety of inviting event spaces to suit your needs. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering with close friends or a larger-scale celebration, we've got you covered. ğŸ· The Wine Bar: Our elegant wine bar provides a cozy and stylish atmosphere for smaller groups. It's the perfect setting for an intimate birthday dinner or a sophisticated wine tasting event. ğŸŒ¿ The Outdoor Patio: If you prefer an open-air experience, our spacious patio, complete with misting fans and all-natural cedar mosquito repellent, creates a comfortable environment for your guests. It's ideal for everything from outdoor weddings to fun, casual get-togethers. ğŸ¥‚ The Whole Venue: For grand celebrations, consider booking our entire venue, which can accommodate large parties and is flexible enough to host your dream wedding reception, corporate gala, or any extravagant event. Why Choose Grape and The Grain: Our establishment is not just a wine bar; it's a place where memories are made, and special moments are cherished. Here are a few reasons why Grape and The Grain is the perfect choice for your event: ğŸµ Lively Atmosphere: Our venue exudes a vibrant and welcoming atmosphere that sets the stage for an unforgettable event. ğŸ¾ Excellent Wine Selection: With an extensive wine selection, your guests can savor the finest wines and raise a toast to your special occasion. ğŸŒŸ Stellar Service: Our dedicated team is committed to making your event seamless and ensuring that you and your guests have an exceptional experience. ğŸ’« Endless Possibilities: The versatility of our spaces means that you can tailor your event to match your vision perfectly. Whether you have a specific theme in mind or want a flexible canvas, we're here to make it happen. Ready to Book Your Event? It's as simple as reaching out to us at events@grapeandthegrain.com! You can also fill out our booking form. Our team will work closely with you to understand your event needs, customize packages, and make sure everything is set up according to your preferences. Booking Form: CLICK HERE Grape and The Grain is where unforgettable moments are crafted. Get in touch today to secure your date and start planning the event of a lifetime! From elegant wine tastings to lively parties, Grape and The Grain is your go-to destination for memorable gatherings. We can't wait to be a part of your special day! Contact Us | Arbor Hill Winery Skip to content Our Products New York State Wines Wine Sauces and Syrups Preserves, Jellies & Pie Filling Finishing Sauces Dressings & Vinegar Mustards, Woodstead and Sauerkraut Iced Tea Concentrates & Juices Candies Build a Case Wine/Juice/Food Product Gift Boxes â€“ Corporate or Personal Wine Tastings & Wine Flights Music & Events Brew and Brats Restaurant Contact Us Our Products New York State Wines Wine Sauces and Syrups Preserves, Jellies & Pie Filling Finishing Sauces Dressings & Vinegar Mustards, Woodstead and Sauerkraut Iced Tea Concentrates & Juices Candies Build a Case Wine/Juice/Food Product Gift Boxes â€“ Corporate or Personal Wine Tastings & Wine Flights Music & Events Brew and Brats Restaurant Contact Us $ 0.00 0 Cart Search Contact Us Before sending an email please visit our FAQ page where most questions can be answered. Allow up to 3 days for an email response. I have a question about: Wine Tastings Difference between a Wine Tasting and a Wine Flight Wine Tastings require a reservation and are conducted in our restaurant. Please allow for an hour of tastings with a presentation from one of our knowledgeable staff members. Tastings are $15 per person plus tax. Tastings are for groups of up to 15 people per hour. Tastings are offered Thursday â€“ Sunday Only. Wine Flights are a self-guided wine tasting and do not require a reservation . You may pick your flight in our store during open hours (7 days a week) and enjoy your wine under our outside tents or in the restaurant. Flights are $10 per person plus tax. Wine Flights are for groups of 8 or less. If you do not want to have a tasting or flight but want to enjoy a glass and/or bottle of wine you are welcome to visit our restaurant, Brew & Brats at Arbor Hill, where you can purchase wine by the glass or a bottle. Do I need a reservation for a wine tasting? Yes, If youâ€™d like a guided tasting please book a reservation on our Wine Tastings page, but if youâ€™re just looking for a wine flight stop in anytime the shop is open! If the online reservation system does not offer the day/time you are looking for the slot is either full or unavailable. Please pick a different day/time. What if I have a Passport? Did you purchase a Canandaigua Lake Wine Trail Passport? You still need to make a reservation but before your do please email info@thegrapery.com with a copy of your receipt. We will send you the coupon code required to make your reservation online. If you prefer not to have a full wine tasting you may use your passport for a flight. Be sure to bring your mobile passport with you for your tasting or flight. See our Wine Tasting page for more information or to book a reservation. Ship a Grape Pie We no longer ship Grape Pies. They get destroyed in the shipping process no matter how well we pack them. You can purchase the pie filling we use in our pies. Click HERE for the link. Restaurant Location The restaurant sits directly behind the winery. Just a few steps away. We even share the same parking lot. Bringing my dog Both Arbor Hill Winery Gift Shop and our restaurant, Brew and Brats at Arbor Hill, welcome dogs under our tents which are setup between the winery and restaurant May through October. Water bowls are scattered around or just ask. Dogs are not allowed inside the shop or restaurant. Bringing my kids We are a family friendly establishment. We even offer a juice tasting which can be made the same way you make your wine tasting or can be enjoyed the same way a flight is. Winter Hours Both the Winery Gift Shop and Restaurant are open year-round. Visit the home page of each for hours of operation as they may vary. Live Music Schedule Check out our live music schedule . Bachelorette/Limo Bus/Large Group Inquiry Our wine tasting reservations can accommodate up to 15 people. Wine flights can accommodate up to 8 people. If your group is greater than 15 you will need to email info@thegrapery.com with the date you wish to visit and the reason for your visit. If our schedule allows we will accommodate your group between 11am and 1pm. A large group agreement will be emailed to you along with a pre-payment form. Motorcoach Groups Motorcoach Operators and/or Travel Agencies please email angela@thegrapery.com with the details, dates and times you will be traveling in our area. We offer wine tastings, lunch and shopping. Becoming a reseller Send an email to sales@thegrapery.com with the name of your company, full mailing address, phone number and resale certificate. We will send you a wholesale catalog. Buying products near me Love our Grape Gummi Bears or Black Raspberry Seed Dressing? Find our list of retailers HERE . Something else Something else? You can reach us using our Contact Form . Please allow up to 3 days for an email response. Name Email Message Send Arbor Hill Grapery & Winery 6461 Route 64 Naples, NY 14512 Email: info@thegrapery.com Local: 585-374-2870 Fax: 585-531-3368 Store Hours We are Open Year Round! This exquisite edition is part of Johnnie Walker's continued tradition of commemorating the Chinese New Year with beautifully designed bottles that capture the essence of each zodiac animal. Buy Now View details Quintessential Scotch Johnnie Walker Blue Label is blended to recreate the authentic taste and character of some of the earliest whisky blends created in the 19 century, giving it a rich peaty taste combined with a smooth, distinctly malty flavor that will appeal to the most expert palate. View details Year of The Snake The snake shedding its skin represents the idea of renewal and growth. The three snakes symbolize the attributes of wisdom, intelligence, and intuition, while also representing the past, present, and future. The snakes are constantly growing, transforming, and adapting to changing conditions. View details James Jean James sought inspiration for his designs from the layers of incredible flavor that Johnnie Walker Master Blender Emma Walker and her team bring to Johnnie Walker Blue Label - a whisky made using some of the rarest whiskies from the unparalleled Johnnie Walker reserves of maturing Scotch, including some irreplaceable casks sourced from long-closed â€˜ghostâ€™ distilleries.
